data.name: Blood Elf
data.description:
Blood Elf

Units:
+5% evasion
-20% spell cooldown
-12% damage
-10% hit points

Buildings:
+12.5% mana

Upgrades:
+1Lv Magic

Traits: Glass cannons. Extremely weak starting units. Very fragile even in late game. Heavily relies on special upgrades inside towers. Delivers short outbursts of damage. Strong against buff dependent races.

Difficulty: Expert

auras.name: Brilliance Aura
auras.description:
+0.1 MP/s to units and buildings
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Vampiric Aura
auras.description:
20% melee lifesteal
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Heat Aura
auras.description:
-6 unit armor
(does not affect Special unit)
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Arcane Mastery [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Spell Breaker

Reduces spell damage to Bladedancer, Archer, Spell Breaker, Sorceress and Strider by 25%. Increases their mana by 25.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Orb of Fire [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Incinerating Arrows

Increases Bladedancer and Strider attack rate by 5% and gives them 10%/14%/18%/22% chance to deal 30 damage in 175 AoE.
(can be upgraded in this building)
(slows units for 0.5 sec)

Type: Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Arcane Guardian [D]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Mana Shield

Arcane Guardian replaces Ballista
Siege Unit (Melee)
+50% attack rate
+4 armor
+800 HP
Abilities:
Mana Shield (Self Spell)
(1.5 damage per mana point)
Brilliance aura (Support Aura)
(+5 MP/s in 400 AoE)
Upgrades used:
Truesilver Weapons
Truesilver Armor

Type: Late Game Push

units.name: Arcane Guardian
units.description:
Siege Unit
Strong Vs Buildings
Weak Vs Spellcaster

Upgrades used:

Essence Drain
Mana Shield
Blood Rage

Spellcaster

+25 HP

(40 damage/sec)

bonuses.name: Source of Magic [F]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Essence Drain

Icreases Arcane Sanctum and Sorceress mana by 10%. Unlocks upgrades for them inside this building. Reduces cooldowns of defensive Arcane Sanctum spells by 30%.

Type: Base Defence / Magic Power

upgrades.description:
Gives:
+0.1 MP/sec Arcane Sanctum mana reg

bonuses.name: Blood for Blood [Z]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Blood Sacrifice

Your units will incinerate upon death dealing 20/25/30/35/40 damage in 125 AoE.
Your destroyed buildings will send shockwaves which deal 500 damage to all enemy buildings.
(reveals other player bases)
(upgraded by Blood Magic)

Idea by: Alexander Yamshchikov

Type: Trolling

spells.name: Blood for Blood
spells.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Blood Sacrifice

Your units will incinerate upon death dealing 20/25/30/35/40 damage in 125 AoE.
Your destroyed buildings will send shockwaves which deal 500 damage to all enemy buildings.
(reveals other player bases)
(upgraded by Blood Magic)

Idea by: Alexander Yamshchikov

Type: Trolling

spells.name: Sacrifice [C]
spells.description:
Destroy clockwise Barracks.
Deals 2x damage.

spells.name: Sacrifice [X]
spells.description:
Destroy middle Barracks.
Deals 2x damage.

spells.name: Sacrifice [Z]
spells.description:
Destroy counter clockwise Barracks.
Deals 2x damage.

bonuses.name: Arcane Artifacts [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Arcane Artifacts
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Agility Hero.

bonuses.name: Anti-Magic Shield [C]
bonuses.description:
Reduces spell damage to buildings by 90%.
Has Global Silence and Mana Leak Aura.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Anti-Magic Shield
spells.description:
Reduces spell damage to buildings by 90%.

Type: Anti Ultimate Weapon

spells.name: Global Silence (Lv1) [S]
spells.description:
Silences enemy units and structures for 10 sec.
(does not affect Special unit)
Cooldown: 180 seconds.

spells.name: Mana Leak Aura
spells.description:
-1.5 MP/s to enemy units.
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

Type: Anti Hero
This is not a Hero game. Sometimes you need to stomp your foot down and show those scum their place.

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

spells.name: Shackles Aura (Lv1)
spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.
You get +50% gold for Hero kills.

Type: Anti Hero

upgrades.name: Fuck Heroes (Lv1)
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+10% damage reduction
+3 armor reduction
+1000 Aura range

spells.name: Cripple (Lv1) [W]
spells.description:
Reduces damage by 25% for 60 sec.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.
Deals 25000 damage.
Cooldown: 600 seconds.

towerUpgrades.name: Mana Shield
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: blocks damage with mana
Affects: Bladedancer, Archer, Spell Breaker and Strider

Lv1: 0.6 damage per mana point
Lv2: 0.9 damage per mana point
Lv3: 1.2 damage per mana point
Lv4: 1.5 damage per mana point

towerUpgrades.name: Feedback
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: mana burn on hit
Affects: Spell Breaker and Dragonhawk Rider
(does not affect Special unit)
(affects Kael's Phoenix)

Lv1: burns 4 and 15 mana per hit
Lv2: burns 8 and 30 mana per hit
Lv3: burns 12 and 45 mana per hit
Lv4: burns 16 and 60 mana per hit

towerUpgrades.name: Essence Drain
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: restoration on kill
Affects: Strider
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 25 MP/HP in 200 AoE
Lv2: 50 MP/HP in 200 AoE
Lv3: 75 MP/HP in 200 AoE
Lv4: 100 MP/HP in 200 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Spell Breaker
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: extra unit in each wave
Affects: All Barracks
(can capture neutral buildings)

Lv1: has Spell Steal (steals buffs)
15/12/9/6 sec cooldown
Lv2: has Soul Burn (silences unit)
15/20/25 damage/sec for 45 sec
Lv3: has Defend (blocks damage)
30%/45% chance to block
Lv4: has Mindblast (stuns units)
stuns for 4 sec in 500 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Arcane Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: HP regeneration to nearby units
Affects: Strider
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: +2 HP/s in 400 AoE
Lv2: +4 HP/s in 500 AoE
Lv3: +6 HP/s in 600 AoE
Lv4: +8 HP/s in 700 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Blood Rage
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: faster attack for self damage
Affects: Bladedancer, Archer and Strider

Lv1: +75% attack rate, loses 15 HP/s
Lv2: +150% attack rate, loses 30 HP/s
Lv3: +225% attack rate, loses 45 HP/s
Lv4: +300% attack rate, loses 55 HP/s

towerUpgrades.name: Incinerating Arrows
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to splash fire
Affects: Archer
(splashes in 175 AoE for 10 sec)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: 10%, -2 armor, 5 damage/sec
Lv2: 20%, -4 armor, 10 damage/sec
Lv3: 30%, -6 armor, 15 damage/sec
Lv4: 40%, -8 armor, 20 damage/sec

towerUpgrades.name: Persistent Missiles
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bouncing projectyles
Affects: Sorceress and Arcane Tower
(50% damage loss per bounce)
(does not affect buildings)

Lv1: can bounce 1 time
Lv2: can bounce 2 times
Lv3: can bounce 3 times
Lv4: can bounce 4 times

towerUpgrades.name: Blood Sacrifice
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: boost to your standing forces
Affects: Your dying Heroes
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: +25% damage for 120 sec
Lv2: +50% damage for 150 sec
Lv3: +75% damage for 180 sec
Lv4: +100% damage for 210 sec

t1spell.name: Fireball Barrage [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoE.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Phoenix Spirit Spray [X]
t2spell.description:

Each shockwave deals 700 damage.
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

heroes.name: First Blood Knight
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
Spirit Touch (Healing Spell)
150-300 HP in 550-700 AoE
(affects organic units only)

Essence Drain (Passive Skill)
140-200 HP heal for a kill
(affects organic units only)

Silence Aura (Disable Aura)
15-45 damage/sec and silence
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Defend (Passive Skill)
30-40% to block an attack

heroes.name: Ranger Lord
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Mass Soul Burn (Disable Spell)
15-45 damage/sec and silence
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Cleaving Blade (Passive Skill)
25% for 100-200 damage in 200 AoE

Mana Leak Aura (Disruption Aura)
1-4 mana loss per sec
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Mana Shield (Self Spell)
absorbs 20-26 HP per 1 MP

heroes.name: Blood Mage
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Nuker

Can learn:
Phoenix Strike (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in an area
(150-300 area of effect)

Fireball (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line
(700-1000 wave distance)

Living Bomb (Orb Effect)
30-90 damage on unit kill
(150-300 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)

Phoenix Spirit (Summoning Spell)
summons Phoenix for 30-60 sec

skills.name: Phoenix Strike - [Level 1]
skills.description: Bombards an area with firebals, dealing up to 225 damage to enemy land units.

heroes.name: Phoenix God
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Ranged/Air)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

325-475 damage in an area
(200-350 area of effect)

325-475 damage in an area

Heat Aura (Disable Aura)

(doesn't affect Special unit)

Soul Burn (Damage Spell)
45-75 damage per sec
(affects organic Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)
